channel.title: Elasticsearch on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Elasticsearch on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Create custom rules with ElastAlert
item.description: This article is from the 9th day of [MicroAd Advent Calendar 2019 ](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/microad). #Introduction Everyone loves Elasticsearch, A tool called ElastAlert is useful when you want to constantly monitor data on Elasticsearch and skip alerts when a specific pattern occurs. ElastAlert has many kinds of monitoring patterns called Rule by default, but there are times when it is not enough to meet your needs. In that case, let’s solve it by creating a new monitoring pattern called a custom rule.

item.title: [Python] Device monitoring with IOS-XE On-box Python
item.description: ## Introduction When monitoring Cisco network equipment, you may want to see the results of show commands. This time, from the Guest Shell of IOS-XE, I would like to get the result of the show command using python and send it to Elasticsearch for visualization. About Guest Shell Guest Shell is a Linux container environment hosted on IOx, and is implemented in products such as the Catalyst 9000 series and ISR4000 series.
